column5: I was hoping to actually catch a fish this week sooo... what should I bring or buy???  As a bribe, my wife will make banana bread for everybody! I just have to let her know
All you need at Lakair is a Perch coloured Rapala... or so I've been told numerous years in a row!
And don't forget the medium size white spinner baits
And don't ever forget the Jumlas.
Otherwise known as "the sirloin of the north"
I here they work real good but I have never had the opportunity to own one
Jumlas and maybe drop shot rigs for Gulp leeches

I had some great success up there with bottom bouncing a Gulp worm rigged on a Slow Death hook... non stop action in the current sections below the bridge.  For back bays.... Mepps Cyclops in a Silver-Blue... I shook my head at this one because I had never caught much on them before... but the pike love em.  Enjoy
Mepps Cyclops in a Silver-Blue... Ya, I got 3 of those in different sizes. Pike on Nip love those. Walleye also.
Red and White DareDvle spoons and #5 Mepps Musky Killer...
